pages.question_text: What local authority serves the property?
pages.hint_text: Enter the local authority to which council tax or business rates are normally paid. Where there is more than one local authority serving an area, enter the one to which these are normally paid.

pages.question_text: Do you know the title number?
pages.hint_text: The title number is a unique reference for the property's registration

pages.question_text: What is the title number?
pages.hint_text: Enter the title number if you know it

pages.question_text: What type of property interest is this?
pages.hint_text: Select the type of estate or interest

pages.question_text: What is the property address?
pages.hint_text: Enter the full address of the property

pages.question_text: What type of official copy do you need?
pages.hint_text: Select what you need copies of

options.text: Official copy of the title plan or caution plan
Certificate of inspection of title plan

pages.question_text: How many copies do you need of the register?
pages.hint_text: Enter the total number of copies required

pages.question_text: How many copies do you need of the title plan?
pages.hint_text: Enter the total number of copies required

pages.question_text: How many certificates of inspection do you need?
pages.hint_text: Enter the total number of certificates required

pages.question_text: Has an estate plan been approved for this property?
What is the plot number on the approved estate plan?
What land reference description should be used?
pages.hint_text: For example, 'edged red' or other descriptive reference

pages.question_text: Is there a pending application for registration against this title?
What type of official copy do you need for the pending application?

options.text: Official copy back-dated prior to receipt of the application
Official copy on completion of that application

pages.question_text: How do you want to pay?

options.text: Direct debit, under an agreement with Land Registry

pages.question_text: What is your name?
What is your address?
pages.hint_text: This can be your address or UK DX box number

pages.question_text: What is your email address?
pages.hint_text: We'll use this to send you the official copies electronically unless you request paper format

pages.question_text: What is your phone number?
What is your reference?
pages.hint_text: Optional - your own reference for this application

pages.question_text: Do you have a key number?
pages.hint_text: Key numbers are only available to professional customers, such as solicitors

pages.question_text: What is your key number?
Do you want to receive your official copies in paper format?
pages.hint_text: If you don't select this option, copies will be sent electronically to your email address
